column1: #COVID2019 SOMEONE... tell me the odds of Corona mutating with HIV, and by nature forms a combo that targets the weak and elderly and now starts to show cases of people NOT gaining immunity from surviving infection......... #corona #Covid_19 #wuhan #covid19 #COVID19dk

You simply dont get it do you... its not only about that. Covid-19 has HiV mutated sequences. People in China are already exhibiting signs of not developing anti-bodies when recovering but getting re-infected. Outbreak already killing economy. New crisis inc. #COVID2019 #COVID19

One week ago Danish media and Danish doctors and cdc all said it is just the flu and will probably not hit Denmark. Now we have #COVID2019 and have had it for 12 days... more infected incoming. Ignorant politicians #COVID19 #covid19denmark #corona

Danish #COVID2019 patient at the state hospital has been walking around sick for 10 days infecting people (not deliberately). Doctors give up the idea of finding everyone he has been in contact with. Outbreak unavoidable in DK now... #COVID19 #corona #wuhan #covid19denmark
